events.name: PostCreated
events.description: Represents the creation of a new post for item listings.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: Used to modify existing post details.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: Indicates a post has been removed from listings.

events.name: PostViewed
events.description: Tracks when a post is viewed by a customer.

events.name: PostFlagged
events.description: Allows users to flag posts for review.

events.name: PostShared
events.description: Indicates a post has been shared on social media.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: Represents the creation of a new post for item listings.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: Used to modify existing post details.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: Indicates a post has been removed from listings.

commands.name: ViewPost
commands.description: Tracks when a post is viewed by a customer.

commands.name: FlagPost
commands.description: Allows users to flag posts for review.

commands.name: SharePost
commands.description: Indicates a post has been shared on social media.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryContext
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with inventory for real-time updates on item availability related to posts.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagementContext
integrationPoints.description: Integration with user management for tracking post authors.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationContext
integrationPoints.description: Send notifications to users when posts are created or updated.

integrationPoints.name: AnalyticsContext
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with analytics to track post engagement metrics.
